PrepScholar will increase your SAT score, period. We’re backing that up with the industry’s best money-back guarantee.

Real Results

We calculate these metrics using a sample of self-reported before and after scores from students enrolled in our SAT prep program. The statistics on this page are from a sample of students who took an "after" exam in 2020.

  • 50% of students improved 100 points or more
  • 25% of students improved 370 points or more

More Motivation to Study

Students who use PrepScholar study more than students who use other courses.

According to published research studies, the average student spends fewer than 10 hours studying for the test. PrepScholar students in our 2020 sample studied an average of 27 hours. More study time means higher score improvements - it"s simple math.
